    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Attunement](/Feats.aspx?ID=2997) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Geomancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=100)

**Prerequisites**
[Geomancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2995)

</column>

---

When you would gain a benefit from your terrain attunement, you can grant it to one ally within 30 feet instead of yourself. This has no effect if the terrain attunement affects your foes instead of granting you a benefit.
name: Shared Attunement
